name: Wild Ride (Devil Kitty Games)
description:
Devil Kitty Games is proud to present Wild Ride (working title).  Wild Ride is a desktop driving shooter written in Unity3d.      

Join us on Discord

As Wild Ride is in pre-alpha, expect to have bugs and features that are missing or incomplete. 

Can you Survive the Ride?

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys

Left Ctrl or Left Mouse Button to fire machine guns

Right Ctrl or Right Mouse Button to fire projectile weapon

Mouse Scroll wheel or numbers to change weapons
